colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(ZHES RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BTZONG KHA PA NAS BRGYUD PA'I SENG GDONG MA GTZO 'KHOR GSUM @016B GYI SGRUB THABS SPU GRI'I 'BAR BA'I 'KHRUL 'KHOR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DENG SANG PHYOGS PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS, RJE BLA MA'I MAN NGAG THUN MONG MA YIN PA 'DI 'DRA YOD BZHIN DU, DE LAS ZAB PA'I SENG GDONG MA'I MAN NGAG ZHIG GZHAN DU YOD SNYAM PAS, GZHAN PHYOGS KYI MAN NGAG ZAB ZAB MOR BTAGS PA'I SHOG 'KHYER DE GNYIS LA KHYI DANG SLO A PHRAD PA BZHIN 'JUG PA MTHONG ZHING, RJE BLA MA'I MAN NGAG 'DI LA YANG, KLONG BSHAGS BSUN BZLOG ,TSOGS BRGYA, ME MCHOD SOGS RNYING LUGS RGYAS 'GEBS SNA TSOGS PAS BSLANG BAR BYED PA 'GA' ZHIG KYANG MTHONG NAS, RANG LUGS GTZANG SENG NGE BA'I YIG CHA ZHIG 'BRI 'DUN YOD THOG ,NYE CHAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'OD 'BAR DU PHA ROL GYI BSAM SBYOR NGAN PA'I MTHU GTAD SOGS LTAS MTSAN BYUNG BA BZLOG CHED DU, SENG GDONG MA DANG, CHAGS LUGS @017A *, ,KHRO RGYAL GTZUG TOR 'BAR BA GNYIS KYIS GTZO BA'I PHYIR BZLOG GI SGRUB PA KHAG 'GA' ZHIG 'DZUG 'DUN SKABS, KLAG CHOG 'DI LTA BU 'KHOR 'DUG TSUL 'GA' ZHIG GIS MOS PA LA BRTEN NAS, BTZUN GZUGS ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS RJE LCANG SKYA GONG MA DANG, RGYAL DBANG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I SENG GDONG MA GTZO RKYANG GI SGRUB THABS DANG, RDO RJE 'DZIN PA CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I GTZO 'KHOR GSUM MA'I SGRUB THABS RNAMS GONG 'OG SGRIB GNYIS BZHIS GA-YO RGYAN GLING DU MGYOGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DON 'GRUB BO, ,)
